summary: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.
cast: Michelle Pfeiffer|Paul Rudd|Saoirse Ronan|Stacey Dash|Fred Willard|Jon Lovitz|Sarah Alexander|Tracey Ullman|Yasmin Paige|Rory Copus|O-T Fagbenle|Jayden Berry-Garvey|Iddo Goldberg|Noah Lee Margetts|Jonathan Ryland|Phil Cornwell|Ray Thacker|Graham Norton|Twink Caplan|Olivia Colman|Celia Meiras|Steve Pemberton|Simon Kunz|Archie Panjabi|Ben Bennett|Chike Chan|John Paul Horsley|Mackenzie Crook|Peter Polycarpou|Doña Croll|David Mitchell|Sally Kellerman|Ashley Lloyd|Troy Gentile|Cassandra Bell|Ed Byrne|Sam Fusaro|Joe Montana|Victoria Chalaya|James Harley|Jennifer Sims|Lasco Atkins|Jed Bernard|David Cassidy|Rene Costa|Kya Garwood|Erin Gavin|Michelle Kochanski|Melanie Martin|Benito Mussolini|Richard Nixon|Wallace Shawn|Owen Stanley|Ronan Summers|Henry Winkler
title: El novio de mi madre
